Title: Drug trafficking: India Police arrest two Nigerians
Summary: India’s anti-narcotics wing of Central Crime Branch (CCB) arrested two Nigerians . Thomas Navid Chime and Ngwu Kingsley Chukwuemeka were arrested in Bengaluru . The duo purchased MDMA crystals and ecstasy pills .

Title: Trump unlikely to win Nobel Peace Prize, but who will?
Summary: US President Donald Trump unlikely to win Nobel Peace Prize, no matter how much he wants it . But who will? The Norwegian Nobel Committee in Oslo will bring the prize to Washington .

Title: Snakebite surge as Bangladesh hit by record rains
Summary: Doctors and experts warn snakebites are on the rise, driven by heavy rains, shrinking populations and heavy rainfall . In the swamplands along Bangladesh’s mighty Padma River, snakes slithering through villages have become an unrelenting menace .

Title: US, Qatar, Turkey to join third day of Gaza peace talks in Egypt
Summary: Qatar’s prime minister and senior delegates from the United States and Turkey will join Hamas and Israeli negotiators on Wednesday for a third day of talks aimed at ending the Gaza war . Israel and Hamas are holding indirect negotiations in Egypt .

Title: Students stage peaceful protest in Ibadan in support of Dangote Refinery
Summary: Students under the National Association of Oduduwa Students (NAOS), the Coalition of Yoruba Students, and the Yoruba Movement staged a peaceful protest in Ibadan, Oyo State . Dangote Refinery is currently locked in a dispute with oil unions and petroleum marketers .

Title: Rail revenue rises 37.36% N2.72bn in Q1’25By Elizabeth Adegbesan
Summary: Revenue generated from rail transport rose by 37.36 per cent Year-on-Year, YoY to N2.724 billion in the first quarter of 2025 . The sharp increase was driven by a 37.4 per cent YoY increase in revenue from passenger transport .

Title: Lagos, Rivers, FCT lead as IGR rises 49% to N3.63 trn
Summary: Internally Generated Revenue (IGR) in 2024 grew year-on-year, YoY,  by 49.7 percent to N3.63 trillion in 2024 . Lagos, Rivers and the Federal Capital Territory, FCT States, took the lead .

Title: Why I decided to bow out of INEC – Yakubu
Summary: Yakubu said that his bowing out would also enable the person taking over to quickly settle down to the task of conducting elections and electoral activities .

Title: Certificate forgery allegations: Why Minister, Geoffrey Nnaji, resigned
Summary: Minister of Innovation, Science and Technology, Geoffrey Nnaji, has resigned, following allegations of certificate forgery against him . Minister of innovation, science and technology has resigned from his post .

Title: Federal Highway of Horror 2: Motorists, travellers in anguish
Summary: The dilapidated highways subject motorists and passengers to a gruelling experience . Ditchy highways have made inter-state travel in Nigeria a nightmare .
